name: Fyavolv
indications: fyavolv combination estrogen progestin indicated woman uterus : treatment moderate severe vasomotor symptoms due menopause ( 1.1 ) prevention postmenopausal osteoporosis ( 1.2 )
adverseReactions: undiagnosed abnormal genital bleeding ( 4 , 5.2 ) breast cancer history breast cancer ( 4 , 5.2 ) estrogen-dependent neoplasia ( 4 , 5.2 ) active dvt , pe , history conditions ( 4 , 5.1 ) active arterial thromboembolic disease ( example , stroke myocardial infarction ) , history conditions ( 4 , 5.1 ) known anaphylactic reaction , angioedema , hypersensitivity fyavolv ( 4 ) hepatic impairment disease ( 4 , 5.10 ) protein c , protein , antithrombin deficiency , known thrombophilic disorders ( 4 )
indications_original: Fyavolv is a combination of an estrogen and progestin indicated in a woman with a uterus for: Treatment of Moderate to Severe Vasomotor Symptoms due to Menopause ( 1.1 ) Prevention of Postmenopausal Osteoporosis ( 1.2 )
adverseReactions_original: Undiagnosed abnormal genital bleeding ( 4 , 5.2 ) Breast cancer or a history of breast cancer ( 4 , 5.2 ) Estrogen-dependent neoplasia ( 4 , 5.2 ) Active DVT, PE, or history of these conditions ( 4 , 5.1 ) Active arterial thromboembolic disease (for example, stroke and MI), or a history of these conditions ( 4 , 5.1 ) Known anaphylactic reaction, angioedema, or hypersensitivity to Fyavolv ( 4 ) Hepatic impairment or disease ( 4 , 5.10 ) Protein C, protein S, or antithrombin deficiency, or other known thrombophilic disorders ( 4 )
